track.name: Hope
comments: My 1st listen to these guys was a jazzanova remix of Flashback.  I thought they were from Philly, DC or New York.  Imagine my shock when I found out they were are Kiwi's!!!! Imagine my shock to find out there's a hell of a lot of soulful stuff coming out of New Zealand   puts a new spin on small world
Saw them in London last year- one of the best concerts i hav ever seen! they were fuckin amazin- I was goin crazy! Super crazy!
One of the best bands- for sure!!!
cant stop singin the chorus.... this tunes in my head when i wake! His voice is amazin, aparantley he's not 2hype live tho... i gotsta see em n find out
I like these guys more and more with every track I hear by them.
hey,  you guys just touched somebody on the other end of this planet
hope for a generation. we need it now more than ever.
I'd fly to see that band!
Couldn't end the album with a better song. Fits perfect. love it
This is such as soulful track. I enjoy it's slow jam.
great one to lax out to.
amb ganes de disfrutar cada instant!!!això em diu la cançó! one heart, one soul!
